name: Nivek's Tale DEMO
description:
Story

This Game's storyline has changed so many times. But here I go. In this RPG you are a character named Shadow, your parents went missing about 2 years ago. So you set out on an adventure to find them. But you're stopped by something. (I dont want to spoil it, so find out yourself.)

Credits

Your Local Trash for the Graden Character.

Abby even though she quit quite a while ago. She was the reason the character Abbigail was created, I have been doing this story for a long time or the old story where Cody is evil. If she never helped, then i would've quit development and never continued the story. (Abby, if you see this, tysm for your help <3)

My school- For giving me an award which forced me into continuing it.

My family- For helping me with ideas.

Email Me if you have questions.
